DataStructure_Point_Node module

class DataStructure_Point_Node.NodePoint(id, x, y, displacement=None, stepSize=None)

Bases: object

this class is used to store the data of a node attributes:

id: the id of the node x: the x coordinate of the node y: the y coordinate of the node displacement: the displacement of the node

GiveID()

this function is used to return the id of the node Returns:

int: the id of the node

Give_displacement()

this function is used to return the displacement of the node Returns:

float: the displacement of the node

Give_x()

this function is used to return the x coordinate of the node Returns:

float: the x coordinate of the node

Give_y()

this function is used to return the y coordinate of the node Returns:

float: the y coordinate of the node

SetID(ID)

this function is used to set the id of the node Args:

ID(int): the id of the node

ToMatrix()

this function is used to return the node as a matrix Returns:

list: the node as a matrix

ToMatrixWithDisplacement()

this function is used to return the node as a matrix with displacement Returns:

list: the node as a matrix with displacement

ToMatrixWithID()

this function is used to return the node as a matrix with id Returns:

list: the node as a matrix with id

ToMatrixWithIDAndDisplacement()

this function is used to return the node as a matrix with id and displacement Returns:

list: the node as a matrix with id and displacement

distanceToCenter()

this function is used to return the distance of the node to the center of the element Returns:

float: the distance of the node to the center of the element

distanceToPoint(other)

this function is used to return the distance of the node to another node Args:

other(NodePoint): the other node

Returns:

float: the distance of the node to another node

set_displacement(displacement)

this function is used to set the displacement of the node Args:

displacement(float): the displacement of the node
